articles.content:

articles.content: The developers of AlphaFold, an artificial intelligence system for predicting the three-dimensional structure of proteins, are among the winners of the 2023 Lasker Foundation awards. The awards also … [+6781 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft refreshes Surface Laptop Go and Laptop Studio - TechCrunch
articles.description: CEO Satya Nadella took the stage. But hardware was the real star today – specifically the Surface Laptop Go 3 and Surface Laptop Studio 2.
